languages.text: Забившись в темный угол, Джай Хейдари вынуждена была стать свидетельницей предательства, свершенного Вольным Торговцем. Когда изменни{mf|к|ца} Человечества покинул{mf||а} Эпитафию, она осталась на истерзанном планетоиде одна. Увы, это лишь отсрочило ее гибель, поскольку даже самая умелая контрабандистка Простора не смогла бы покинуть миры древних ксеносов без корабля. Не желая принимать муки голода и жажды, она завершила свой путь выстрелом в висок.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.
languages.original_text: Забившись в темный угол, Джай Хейдари вынуждена была стать свидетельницей предательства, свершенного Вольным Торговцем. Когда изменни{mf|к|ца} Человечества покинул{mf||а} Эпитафию, она осталась на истерзанном планетоиде одна. Увы, это лишь отсрочило ее гибель, поскольку даже самая умелая контрабандистка Простора не смогла бы покинуть миры древних ксеносов без корабля. Не желая принимать муки голода и жажды, она завершила свой путь выстрелом в висок.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a corner, had to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, she was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her fate, as even the most skilled smuggler in the entire Expanse, wouldn't be able to leave the worlds of ancient xenos without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a shot to the temple.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a corner, had to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, she was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her fate, as even the most skilled smuggler in the entire Expanse, wouldn't be able to leave the worlds of ancient xenos without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a shot to the temple.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, she was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her fate, as even the most skilled smuggler in the entire Expanse would need a ship to leave ancient xenos worlds. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the temple.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, she was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her fate, as even the most skilled smuggler in the entire Expanse would need a ship to leave ancient xenos worlds. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the temple.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利蜷缩在某个阴暗的角落里，被迫目睹了行商浪人的背叛。人类的叛徒离开了荒垄碑碣，而她被遗弃在了这个饱受折磨的小行星上，孤身一人。遗憾的是，这仅仅是稍微延缓了她不可避免的死亡。在没有飞船的情况下，哪怕是整个扩区中最为狡猾的走私者，也根本没办法离开这个古老的异形世界。她不愿忍受干渴与饥饿，便对自己的头颅开了一枪，就此结束了性命。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利蜷缩在角落里，被迫目睹了行商浪人的背叛。人类的叛徒离开了荒垄碑碣，而她被遗弃在了这个饱受折磨的小行星上，孤身一人。遗憾的是，这仅仅是稍微延缓了她不可避免的死亡。哪怕是整个扩区中最为老练的走私者，也得找到一艘船才能离开这古老的异形世界。她不愿忍受干渴与饥饿，便对自己的太阳穴开了一枪，就此结束了生命。

languages.text: Jae Heydari musste in einer dunklen Ecke kauernd den Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} miterleben. Als {mf|der Verräter|die Verräterin} der Menschheit Epitaph verließ, blieb Jae alleine auf dem gepeinigten Planetoiden zurück. Das zögerte ihr Schicksal jedoch nur hinaus, denn selbst die listigsten Schmuggler in der gesamten Ausdehnung konnten die uralten Xenos-Welten nicht ohne Schiff verlassen. Da sie nicht gewillt war, Durst und Hunger zu erleiden, setzte sie ihrer Reise durch eine Kugel in die Schläfe ein Ende.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari musste in der Ecke kauernd den Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} miterleben. Als {mf|der Verräter|die Verräterin} der Menschheit Epitaph verließ, blieb sie alleine auf dem gepeinigten Planetoiden zurück. Das zögerte ihr Schicksal jedoch nur hinaus, denn selbst die fähigsten Schmuggler in der gesamten Ausdehnung brauchen ein Schiff, um uralte Xenos-Welten zu verlassen. Da sie nicht gewillt war, Durst und Hunger zu erleiden, setzte sie ihrer Reise durch eine Kugel in die Schläfe ein Ende.

languages.text: Jae Heydari, recroquevillée dans un coin sombre de la pièce, fut contrainte d'assister à la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. {mf|Le traître|La traîtresse} de l'humanité quitta Épitaphe sans elle, l'abandonnant à son sort sur le planétoïde. Hélas, cela ne fit que repousser sa triste fin, car même la plus talentueuse des contrebandières des Étendues aurait eu besoin d'un vaisseau pour quitter ce monde xénos ancien. Refusant de mourir de faim ou de soif, elle choisit de mettre un terme à sa vie d'une balle dans la tête.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari, recroquevillée dans un coin de la pièce, fut contrainte d'assister à la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. {mf|Le traître|La traîtresse} de l'humanité quitta Épitaphe sans elle, l'abandonnant à son sort sur le planétoïde. Cela ne fit que repousser sa triste fin, car même la plus talentueuse des contrebandières des Étendues aurait eu besoin d'un vaisseau pour quitter ce monde xénos ancien. Refusant de mourir de faim ou de soif, elle choisit de mettre un terme à sa vie d'une balle dans la tête.

languages.text: Jae Heydari, acurrucada en un rincón oscuro, se vio forzada a presenciar la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Cuando {mf|el traidor|la traidora} de la Humanidad abandonó Epitafio, se encontró sola en el planetoide torturado. Por desgracia, eso solo postergó su fin, ya que incluso la contrabandista más hábil de toda la Extensión necesita una nave para abandonar un antiguo mundo xenos. En lugar de sufrir la tortura de la sed y el hambre, puso fin a su viaje con una bala en la cabeza.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari, acurrucada en un rincón, se vio forzada a presenciar la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Cuando {mf|el traidor|la traidora} de la Humanidad abandonó Epitafio, se encontró sola en el planetoide torturado. Por desgracia, eso solo postergó su destino, ya que incluso la contrabandista más hábil de toda la Extensión necesita una nave para abandonar un antiguo mundo xenos. En lugar de sufrir la tortura de la sed y el hambre, puso fin a su viaje con una bala en la sien.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは暗い隅で丸くなって、自由開拓者の裏切りを目撃することを余儀なくされた。人類の裏切り者が墓碑を去ったとき、ジェイは苦痛を強いられたこの小惑星にひとり取り残された。残念なことに、これは彼女の運命を遅らせただけだった。エクスパンスで最も狡猾な密輸業者でさえ、古代の異種族の世界を離れるには船が必要だったからだ。喉の渇きと空腹に苦しむことを望まず、彼女は自身の頭に弾丸を撃ち込んでその旅を終えた。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは隅で丸くなって、ローグトレーダーの裏切りを目撃することを余儀なくされた。人類の裏切り者が墓碑を去ったとき、彼女は苦痛を強いられたこの小惑星にひとり取り残された。残念なことに、これは彼女の運命を遅らせただけだった。エクスパンスで最も熟練した密輸業者でさえ、古代のゼノの世界を離れるには船が必要だったからだ。喉の渇きと空腹に苦しむことを望まず、彼女は自身に弾丸を撃ち込んでその旅を終えた。

languages.text: Karanlık bir köşeye kıvrılan Jae Heydari, Hür Tacir'in ihanetine şahitlik etmek zorunda kaldı. Hainin Sinyazıt'tan ayrılmasıyla Jae, kederli cüce gezegende bir başına kaldı. Bu durum, ölümünü yalnızca erteleyecekti. Nihayetinde Enginlik'teki en kurnaz kaçakçı bile kadim bir zeno dünyasından gemi olmadan ayrılamazdı. Susuzluk ve açlık içinde acı çekmek istemediğinden kafasına bir kurşun sıkarak yolculuğunu tamamladı.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari, curled up in a dark corner, was forced to witness the Rogue Trader's betrayal. When the traitor of Humanity left Epitaph, Jae was left on the tortured planetoid alone. Alas, this only delayed her doom, as even the most cunning smuggler in the entire Expanse could not leave the ancient xenos worlds without a ship. Not willing to suffer thirst and hunger, she ended her journey with a bullet to the head.

traits.locale_text: Karanlık bir köşeye kıvrılmış durumdaki Jae Heydari, Hür Tacir'in ihanetine şahitlik etmek zorunda kaldı. Hain, Kitabe'yi terk ettiğinde, Jae kederli cüce gezegende kendi başına kaldı. Bu, ölümünü yalnızca erteleyecekti. Nihayetinde Enginlik'teki en kurnaz kaçakçı bile kadim bir zeno dünyasından bir gemi olmadan ayrılamazdı. Susuzluk ve açlık nedeniyle acı çekmek istemediği için yolculuğunu kafasına bir kurşun sıkarak tamamladı.
